ðŸ“– Summary: Everwilds is a prototype MMORPG demonstrating networking and netcode architecture, inspired by World of Warcraft. It serves as a learning resource, showcasing client-server interaction, character movement synchronization, and basic game systems. The project aims to provide insights into the technical foundations of large-scale online games.
